00001 #import <Foundation/Foundation.h>
00002 
00003 /* This class is a "transformer" which can be used for creating a tree of
00004 NSMutableDictionaries from a prototype tree of NSMutableDictionaries, where
00005 the two trees have different formats; that is, different keys and sub-keys.
00006 */
00007 
00008 
00009 
00010 @interface SSYTreeTransformer : NSObject
00011 {
00012         SEL _reformatter;
00013         SEL _childrenInExtractor ;
00014         SEL _newParentMover ;
00015         id _contextObject ;
00016 }
00017 
00018 + (SSYTreeTransformer*)treeTransformerWithReformatter:(SEL)reformatter
00019                                                                  childrenInExtractor:(SEL)childrenInExtractor
00020                                                                           newParentMover:(SEL)newParentMover
00021                                                                            contextObject:(id)contextObject ;
00022 /*
00023 reformatter must be an instance method of the input object's class that
00024 returns an instance of the output class, autoreleased, representing the
00025 a shallow copy of the receiver in the output format, or nil if the
00026 receiver cannot be transformed due to missing keys or other corruption.
00027 If the receiver has children, the returned dictionary should have no
00028 children, but shall accept children using childAppender.  reformatter
00029 may optionally accept one argument.  Alternative prototypes:
00030         (id)reformat ;
00031         (id)reformatWithContext: ;
00032 
00033 childrenInExtractor must be an instance method of an NSMutableDictionary,
00034 keyed with the input format, that returns an autoreleased NSArray of the
00035 receiver's children, or nil if no children.  Prototype:
00036         (NSArray*)children ;
00037 
00038 newParentMover must be an instance method of an NSMutableDictionary,
00039 keyed with the output format, that appends the receiver to the
00040 children of the argument.  Prototype:
00041         (void)moveToNewParent:(NSMutableDictionary*)newParent ;
00042 
00043 contextObject is an object that will be passed as an argument to the
00044 reformatter.  If reformatter does not have an argument, contextObject
00045 must be nil.  If reformatter does have an argument, contextObject must
00046 not be nil.
00047 */
00048 
00049 + (SSYTreeTransformer*)treeTransformerWithReformatter:(SEL)reformatter
00050                                                                  childrenInExtractor:(SEL)childrenInExtractor
00051                                                                           newParentMover:(SEL)newParentMover ;
00052 /*
00053 Same as previous method, specialized to the case of no reformatter argument */
00054 
00055 - (id)deepTransformedCopyOf:(id)nodeIn ;
00056 /* returns a copy which the invoking method must release */
00057 
00058 @end
